bibl.note: I. Introduction. - II. The Demotic 'Cession'. - III. Sale Cessions. - IV. Contract-Release Cessions. - V. The British Museum Contract-Release Cessions: 1. P. BM [P. Lond. Contract-Release Cessions from Pathyris; - Table 2. Contract-Release Cessions from Other Egyptian Sites.
